Games.name: Games
Games.description: Playable games to test your skills, memory, and luck.

apps.title: Higher or Lower Card Game
apps.description: Guess if the next card will be higher or lower than the current one.

apps.title: Soccer Pong
apps.description: A Pong-style game with a soccer twist. Player vs. AI.

apps.title: Memory Game
apps.description: Test your memory by matching pairs of cards.

apps.title: Rock Paper Scissors
apps.description: Play the classic game of Rock Paper Scissors against the computer.

apps.title: Tic Tac Toe
apps.description: Play the classic game of Tic Tac Toe against another player or AI.

apps.title: Connect Four
apps.description: Play the classic game of Connect Four against another player or AI.

apps.title: Mastermind
apps.description: Play the classic code-breaking game of Mastermind (Bulls and Cows).

apps.title: Word Ladder
apps.description: Transform one word into another by changing one letter at a time.

apps.title: Lights Out
apps.description: A classic logic puzzle where you turn off all the lights.

apps.title: Nonogram
apps.description: Solve picture logic puzzles by filling cells according to numerical clues.

apps.title: Whack-a-Bug
apps.description: Test your reflexes by fixing bugs as fast as you can!

apps.title: Simon Says
apps.description: Test your memory by repeating the sequence of lights.

apps.title: Roguelike Adventure
apps.description: A simple terminal-like roguelike game.

Whimsical Tools.name: Whimsical Tools
Whimsical Tools.description: Playful generators and tools for creative and imaginative tasks.

apps.title: Codename Generator
apps.description: Generate cool, spy-ish project names.

apps.title: Fantasy Name Generator
apps.description: Generate fantasy names for characters, places, and items.

apps.title: Picker Wheel
apps.description: A spinning wheel to pick a random winner from a list of entries.

apps.title: Tournament Bracket
apps.description: Create and manage tournament brackets.

apps.title: Dice Roller
apps.description: Roll various types of dice for your games and adventures.

apps.title: Excuse Generator
apps.description: Generate funny and absurd excuses for any situation.

apps.title: Magic 8-Ball
apps.description: Ask a yes/no question and let the Magic 8-Ball reveal your fate!

apps.title: Whiteboard
apps.description: A simple digital whiteboard for sketching and doodling.

apps.title: Football Emblem Creator
apps.description: Create your own custom football team emblem.

apps.title: Banana for Scale
apps.description: Convert real-world measurements into standard bananas.

apps.title: Pirate Speak Translator
apps.description: Translate your landlubber words into proper Pirate speak!

apps.title: Galactic Age Converter
apps.description: Calculate your age on other planets in our solar system.

apps.title: Bubble Wrap
apps.description: Pop some virtual bubble wrap to relieve stress.

Generators.name: Generators
Generators.description: Tools for generating various types of data and content.

apps.title: JSON Generator
apps.description: Generate random JSON objects with customizable structure and data types.

apps.title: Hash Generator
apps.description: Generate SHA1, SHA256, and SHA512 hashes from text.

apps.title: UUID Generator
apps.description: Generate UUID v4.

apps.title: Password Generator
apps.description: Generate strong, random passwords with customizable options.

apps.title: QR Code Generator
apps.description: Generate QR codes from text or URLs with customizable versions and error correction.

apps.title: Color Palette Generator
apps.description: Generate random color palettes.

apps.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
apps.description: Generate random placeholder text for your projects.

Converters.name: Converters
Converters.description: Tools for converting data formats and types.

apps.title: JSON - PIML Converter
apps.description: Convert JSON to PIML and vice-versa.

apps.title: Case Converter
apps.description: Convert text to different cases (e.g., uppercase, lowercase, camelCase).

apps.title: Base64 Converter
apps.description: Encode and decode text to and from Base64 format.

apps.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
apps.description: Encode and decode URL strings.

apps.title: Text to ASCII Converter
apps.description: Convert text to ASCII codes and vice-versa.

apps.title: CSS Unit Converter
apps.description: Convert between px, em, rem, vw, vh, and % units.

apps.title: Morse Code Translator
apps.description: Translate text to Morse code and vice-versa, with audio playback.

Utilities.name: Utilities
Utilities.description: General purpose tools and helpers for various tasks.

apps.title: Image Toolkit
apps.description: A toolkit for basic image manipulations.

apps.title: Image Compressor
apps.description: Compress images to reduce file size while maintaining quality.

apps.title: Word Counter
apps.description: Count words, characters, lines and paragraphs in a text.

apps.title: JSON Formatter & Validator
apps.description: Format and validate JSON data for readability and correctness.

apps.title: Color Contrast Checker
apps.description: Check WCAG color contrast ratios for accessibility.

apps.title: Text Diff Checker
apps.description: Compare two texts and highlight the differences.

apps.title: CRON Job Generator
apps.description: Generate CRON expressions visually and convert human-readable text to CRON.

apps.title: Stopwatch
apps.description: A simple stopwatch with lap functionality.

apps.title: Pomodoro Timer
apps.description: A simple and customizable Pomodoro timer to boost your productivity.

apps.title: BPM Guesser
apps.description: Tap the beat to guess the BPM of a song.
